item.title: 【Cinema Center】MOVIE - Barbie Starlight Adventure (576p DVD-Remux)
item.description:
• Barbie, a space Princess, sees her world rapidly change when the stars in the sky begin to fade away. On her fascinating voyage to a new planet, she joins forces with a special rescue team. Is cosmic Barbie the hero the universe needs?
  • Barbie(TM) is a cosmic princess who flies high on her hoverboard through a far-off universe with her adorable and devoted pet sidekick, Pupcorn. One day, everything changes when the twinkling stars start to dim and slow their dance in the sky. Barbie(TM) travels to a beautiful new planet to join a special rescue team on a mission to save the stars. Once there, she teams up with a group of talented new friends who work together to save the galaxy through exciting hoverboarding adventures. Barbie(TM) soon discovers that if she listens to her heart, and with the help of her friends, she might be the leader the whole universe has been waiting for!
Click to expand...

item.title: 【General Music Discussion】What tools do you use for editing songs and exporting them in real lossless?
item.description:
Hi everyone!

Sometimes, I like to edit songs when the have glitches at the end or beginning of the song, or when it has too much empty seconds in the end. What tools do you guys use for doing that in order to export them in real lossless? I’ve been using Audacity till now, but can anyone please tell me if it’s the best option? At least Audacity is open source & very user friendly.

Waiting for suggestions

PS: If Audacity does the same thing as other editing tools, it’s fine for me.
item.author: Marin

item.title: 【HD Live Performances】HDTV - Tove Lo - iHeartRadio Music Festival, USA, 2015 [caladan]
item.description:
Here is an excellent mini-show with the very talented Swedish popstar Tove Lo. Her voice is magical.

The origin of this video:
- I downloaded the entire iHeartRadio Music Festival 2015 Day 2 1080i HDTV 35 Mbps MPA2.0 H.264-TrollHD by TrollHD (88.7 GB!);
- I extracted Tove's show using MKVtoolnix (lossless);
- Using Avisynth, I deinterlaced the video with QTGMC for a smooth double fps (59.97 fps);
- I converted the video to MP4 AVC CRF 18 Preset Slower using FFmpeg;
- I converted the audio to WAV and I increased the volume with Audacity as much as possible without clipping;
- I muxed the video and audio with Avidemux and I converted the audio to AAC 224 kbps;
- I added chapters for each song with MKVtoolnix;

It's a must-have for any real pop fan.

Setlist:
1. Not on Drugs
2. Moments
3. Talking Body
4. Habits (Stay High)
